thread.title: Wife of Dallas Cowboys' Cole Beasley rips, curses out fans after husband's muff vs. Giants
thread.title_full: Wife of Dallas Cowboys' Cole Beasley rips, curses out fans after husband's muff vs. Giants | NJ.com

author: Charles Curtis | For NJ Advance Media
title: Wife of Dallas Cowboys' Cole Beasley rips, curses out fans after husband's muff vs. Giants
text:
Cole Beasley's afternoon against the Giants ended with another Dallas Cowboys miscue when he muffed a Brad Wing punt that was recovered by Myles White, sealing a victory for the Giants instead of giving quarterback Matt Cassel one more shot at a comeback with 1:36 remaining.
Of course, the Cowboys receiver then heard from irate fans on Twitter, but it was his wife Kyrstin who battled the trolls ... and she used some seriously foul language.
PLUS: Greg Hardy gives classless postgame press conference
The Dallas Morning News captured some of the tweets sent to Beasley and his wife's response, which you can read below (the offensive language is blacked out, so if you want to read the uncensored version, you can go here , though we warn you again: it's NSFW ).
Krystin Beasley deleted the tweets not long after sending them and made her account private. She eventually apologized.
The receiver sent this SFW tweet after his gaff:
I apologize to all the fans. I must be better. Thanks for all the support from the true fans. You know who you are. #cowboysnation
â€” Cole Beasley (@Bease11) October 26, 2015
